name: Simmons Suites

reviews.text: This is a brand new hotel in Bentonville. Although there are many more recognizable hotel names in the area, you would be hard pressed to find a nicer more comfortable place to stay. My party booked a total of 3 rooms for 4 people. All of us simply loved the place! When we checked in both Mr. and Mrs. Simmons introduced themselves to me. The rooms are large with a nicely equipped kitchenette, large bath and shower. Most hotels supply a mattress that is as hard as a piece of plywood. My Simmons Suites bed was surprisingly comfortable. On top of that they offer free internet access, a large variety of complimentary snacks in each of the rooms that is replenished every day and a very helpful staff. If I need to visit the area again the Simmons Suites will be the first place that I call.
reviews.title: Wonderful place!

reviews.text: I picked this hotel based on location and was very pleasantly surprised by the 'off the chart' great attitude of the ENTIRE staff. This is a brand new hotel run by a family that knows the hospitality business inside/out. I spend approx 70 nights/year in hotels all over the world and it was my pleasure to stay here. They actually made me feel welcome. Good facility, people, location and value.
reviews.title: great staff,clean new hotel

reviews.text: The Simmons Suites is a great hotel for both business and family. I've stayed there for both. Suites are roomy and elegant, all flat screens, hot wi-fi, great pool and hot tub and hi tech work out facility.

reviews.text: From the minute they pick you up at the airport until the time Herbert waves goodbye, it's like you're staying with family. Very friendly and clean. Breakfast feels a bit institutional, but it's free so you can't take issue. Love the free snacks in the room. Ask for a room facing the back of the hotel if freeway noise is bothersome to you.
reviews.title: Like Staying With Family
Amazing
reviews.text: My stay at Simmons Suites was as close to being at home as possible. From the start: I was checked in by the owner and she was so sweet and hospitable. I felt like I was staying in her home. The decor was warm and rich throughout the hotel. My room was immaculate. Loved the ice cream, water and snacks that were in my room. Breakfast, hosted by Mr Simmons, was again, as close to being at home as possible. Loved, loved, loved it!

I used to travel quite a bit for work and stayed in many hotel chains including Ritz-carlton, Hyatt, Marriott, and Hilton but none of these hotels can beat the service provided by the comparatively smaller Simmons Suites in Bentonville. They offer - free rides to any place you need to go to (dinner, movies, Barnes & Nobles, airport), free icecream, cookies, chips and water in your room, free HOT breakfast.... and the list goes on & on... Best of all, they develop a relationship with you and you would never want to stay at any other place.
reviews.title: Best Service Ever

reviews.text: Myself and a colleague where on a short but sweet business trip in Bentonville Ark. We had received an invitation to stay at the Simmons Suite hotel and decided to take up the offer. It was by far, the best decision. This hotel was not only sparkling clean, but the service was incredible. It is a quaint hotel which offers a business center, fitness room, pool and mini breakfast dining area. The shuttle serviced they offer is second to none and always with a smile to be had. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bentonville for business or otherwise. I will be booking in there for any upcoming trips we have to that town.
reviews.title: Here's a place worth staying

reviews.text: I was here on business and was very happy with my accommodations. I was surprised to have water, snacks and ice cream FREE! in my room. You normally have to pay for those items. I also liked the in room refridgerator and micorwave. The breakfast was fast and very good every morning. The staff was very friendly. My flight leaving was cancelled so I returned for another night. They picked me up from the airport and took me back the next day. Both staff members were extremely friendly. I hadn't packed any additional clothing, but there were washer and dryers there to use for FREE. There was even free detergent to use. If I were to come back for leisure, I would definitely stay at Simmons!
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: We were in town for a wedding, and Simmons Suites was the perfect place to stay. The hotel is beautiful, the rooms are comfortable, breakfast with Mrs. Simmons is yummy and entertaining....everything was so nice. As an added bonus, the pool was filled with toys and floaties for our little ones! What a helpful touch. We will certainly stay here again. Thank you!

description: Simmons Suites, opened in 2007, is conveniently located off of I-540 in Bentonville and 15 miles from Northwest Arkansas Regional Airport (XNA). The hotel is the perfect location for travelers visiting the corporate office of Wal-Mart or Sam’s Club, the Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, Downtown Bentonville, or sporting events at Memorial Park or Phillips Park. The hotel has 112 non-smoking suites featuring either one king bed or two queens, double pillow top mattresses, flat screen televisions, telephone with voicemail, iron/ironing board, hair dryer, sitting area with table, and kitchens with a full-size refrigerator, coffee maker, microwave, stoneware, glassware, and silverware. Hotel amenities include complimentary daily hot breakfast buffet, complimentary wireless internet (wi-fi) throughout the hotel, indoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, complimentary guest laundry, outdoor patio with barbecue grill, on-site convenience store, and the Vendor Club lounge (open nightly Monday-Friday). Parking is complimentary.Meeting and facilities are available for rent for up to 75 people, including tables, chairs, and audio-visual equipment. The hotel’s front desk is staffed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, to provide guests with friendly service. Simmons Suites is pet-friendly (pet deposit applies) and is the perfect choice for business travelers, families, and extended stay guests.
